column4: where'd you pick up that vga for 1280x800, I've been searching ...
I cheated...suse 10.3 set it at install
that's not cheating, that's creative appropriation. Thanks
do you have a pointer to a quick howto on that workgroup in home with fusesmb
never mind, I read down a bit
let me check...give me a sec
I ran into a problem with fusesmb in either suse or ubuntu (I run both on different computers). So I compiled the source and installed from there...don't recall if the issue was in ubuntu or suse
ok, thanks for the warning. I've known of fuse, but hadn't used it until I tried out sshfs. Now I need to know all :)
you can change what gksu uses with gksu-properties, but it defaults to sudo backend
X does that with some cards? I though it used the first free console after 1-6
X uses F7, but it is called from F1....F2 through F6 should still be available for login, but F1 is the original you log into to start x
no, not here.
do you use magnifying glasses?
you can do that with xchat as well ...
I can I think run two instances of Xchat, is that what you mean? I couldn't find a way around those damn tabs
right click the tab, select detach tab
see....learn something new every day <smile>
thanks
it's it great :)
oh, cooties
